DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to evaluate the safety, tolerability and preliminary efficacy of vernakalant (oral) in subjects with sustained atrial fibrillation of greater than 72 hours and less than 6 months duration
DOC.brief_title: Study of RSD1235-SR for the Prevention of Atrial Fibrillation/Atrial Flutter Recurrence
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria (partial list): Subjects must have sustained, symptomatic atrial fibrillation for greater than 72 hours and less than 6 months duration Subjects must have adequate anticoagulant therapy Exclusion Criteria (partial list): Subjects may not have Class III or Class IV congestive heart failure Subjects may not have uncorrected electrolyte imbalance
